updates.name: Initial Update
updates.description: This is the first state of recorded battles in Discomon

updates.name: Wound & Rebound Update #1
updates.description: Wound is changed to trigger every turn, heal procs before stun, dodge or confuse & rebound passive is added to game. Rebound always happens if you've confused or stunned your opponent, otherwise it has a 50% chance of happening. It scales with how much more damage your opponent has than you, with a min of 20 and max of 400.
